traits.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 bludgeoning damage.
